# 1. Generate a dataset from .vcf file to `radpainter` format with `populations`

```{bash, eval = FALSE}
INPUT='~/cophyhopa/results/2022-05-04/assem2_filter.recode.vcf'
OUTPUT='~/cophyhopa/results/2022-05-09/fineRADstructure'
POPMAP='~/cophyhopa/results/2022-05-09/fineRADstructure/popmap.txt'

populations --in-vcf $INPUT --out-path $OUTPUT --popmap $POPMAP -t 10 --radpainter

```

# 2. Run the analysis
```{bash}

RADpainter paint assem2_filter.recode.p.haps.radpainter

finestructure -x 100000 -y 100000 -z 1000 -X -Y assem2_filter.recode.p.haps_chunks.out populations.haps_chunks.mcmc.xml
finestructure -m T -x 100000 -X -Y  assem2_filter.recode.p.haps_chunks.out populations.haps_chunks.mcmc.xml populations.haps_chunks.mcmcTREE.xml

```
